PARAM.help: Set the bridge priority for the spanning tree

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree mst forward-time
COMMAND.help: Set the forward delay for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: forwarding-time-value
PARAM.help: Number of seconds for the forward delay timer

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree mst hello-time
COMMAND.help: Set the hello-time delay for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: hello-time-value
PARAM.help: Number of seconds for the hello delay timer

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree mst max-age
COMMAND.help: Set the max-age timer for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: max-age-value
PARAM.help: Number of seconds for the max-age timer

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree mst max-hops
COMMAND.help: Set the number of possible hops in the region

PARAM.name: max-hops-value
PARAM.help: Number of possible hops in the region before a BPDU is discarded

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree mst force-version
COMMAND.help: Set the force version for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: force-version-value
PARAM.help: Force version for the BPDUs transmitted by multiple spanning tree

PARAM.help: Set the priority of the rapid spanning tree

PARAM.name: hello-time-seconds

PARAM.name: force-version
PARAM.help: Set the force version for the rapid spanning tree

PARAM.name: force-version-value
PARAM.help: Force version for the BPDUs transmitted by rapid spanning tree

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree port
COMMAND.help: Enables port type and bpdu guard/filter on all edge ports

PARAM.name: edge
PARAM.help: Set port type to edge port

PARAM.help: Detemine link type based on media duplex of this interface

PARAM.name: default
PARAM.help: Set edge port as default type

PARAM.name: bpduguard
PARAM.help: Enables BPDU guard by default on all spanning tree edge ports

PARAM.name: default
PARAM.help: Enable BPDU guard by default on all spanning tree edge ports

PARAM.name: bpdufilter
PARAM.help: Enables BPDU filter by default on all spanning tree edge ports

PARAM.name: default
PARAM.help: Enable BPDU filter by default on all spanning tree edge ports

PARAM.name: enable
PARAM.help: Enables BPDU guard on this interface

PARAM.name: disable
PARAM.help: Disables BPDU guard on this interface

PARAM.name: disable
PARAM.help: Disables BPDU filter on this interface

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree guard
COMMAND.help: Guard type Loop or Root or None

PARAM.name: loop
PARAM.help: Set the guard type to loop

PARAM.name: none
PARAM.help: Set the guard type to none

PARAM.name: root
PARAM.help: Set the guard type to root

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree link-type
COMMAND.help: Detemine link type based on media duplex of this interface

PARAM.name: auto
PARAM.help: Set the link type to be determine automatically

PARAM.name: priority-value
PARAM.help: Port priority value in increments of 16 (default = 128)

PARAM.name: cost
PARAM.help: Set the path cost of the interface for PVST calculations

PARAM.name: cost-value
PARAM.help: Value of the port cost or auto assigned value

PARAM.name: port-priority-value
PARAM.help: Port priority value in increments of 16 (default = 128)

PARAM.name: priority
PARAM.help: Change an interface's spanning tree port priority

PARAM.name: priority-value
PARAM.help: Port priority value in increments of 16 (default = 128)

PARAM.name: cost
PARAM.help: set the path-cost parameter for any MST instance including instance ID 0
